nodes.bodyText: Should we test at least the two schemas that we want to support in the future?

nodes.bodyText:
I am doing that already. The KafkaSerializationSchema is supported only in the universal connector.
See https://github.com/apache/flink/pull/12468/files#diff-48ac804bdf7ea70d2485ad2351c26cfc
